valueScreens.description: Through its collaboration with Iron Mountain, a global healthcare customer improved compliance, visibility, and consistency in IT asset disposition across worldwide locations, while maximizing value recovery from retired end-user devices and data center components.
valueScreens.headline: Expanding possibilities

valueScreens.description: Through its collaboration with Iron Mountain, a global healthcare customer improved compliance, visibility, and consistency in IT asset disposition across worldwide locations, while maximizing value recovery from retired end-user devices and data center components.
valueScreens.headline: Expanding possibilities

bullets: Improved accessibility and security of the museum’s assets.
Simplified, modern media access with digitized workflows available instantly from anywhere.
Post-production workflows include automation and annotation support for a digital preservation platform.
Enabled new licensing opportunities for archived performances.
Enhanced licensing potential with multi-angle, high-resolution capture ready for partners.
Created repeatable revenue streams through curated content packages.
Safely archived and protected while enhancements are applied to the collection.
Positioned the museum for future innovation through trusted digital preservation pipelines.
Equipped administrators with advanced discovery tools to craft new storytelling moments.
